projects.name: Customer Portal Redesign

projects.notes: Project is progressing well. UI mockups completed, development 65% done.

projects.name: HR Management System
projects.description: Implementation of comprehensive HR management system for employee tracking, payroll, and performance management
projects.notes: Successfully completed ahead of schedule. System is now live and being used company-wide.

projects.name: Real-time Chat Application

projects.notes: Successfully launched. Platform handling 1000+ orders daily.

projects.notes: Just started. Requirements gathering completed, starting development phase.

projects.name: Financial Reporting Automation
projects.description: Automated financial reporting system with monthly, quarterly, and annual report generation
projects.notes: Project in planning phase. Stakeholder meetings scheduled.
